website_summaries.verdict: A keratin treatment that works at the scalp level to enhance and maintain a hair growth cycle for fuller, thicker hair.
pros: Made with a proprietary keratin amino complex that stimulates hair follicles and may even promote growth
Works overnight for extended treatment time
cons: Very expensive compared to similar products, and doesn't have a nice scent like some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Don't think this is the same as when ordered before-something is different
customer_reviews.text: I used this a year ago and loved the product, this time I noticed it smells more like a strong chemical and not notice any difference in hair growth
customer_reviews.author: P. Watts

customer_reviews.title: May cause flakes to scalp
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because this product makes you have flakes of something that looks like dandruff . Other than that I believe it’s helping the look of my very thin hair . I know it’s this product causing the condition because the times I don’t use it my scalp stays nice and free from I’m guessing the product flaking .
customer_reviews.author: lisalisa38

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have postpartum hair fallout bad!!! Seen that the reviews so so so but I decided to try it out. Within one use I notice my hair was starting to grow back. This product may be pricey but in my case was totally worth it!!! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mua & Xia Xiong

customer_reviews.title: I use all ur products. All last a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I use all ur products. All last a little more then a month so very costly. As much and long as I've used the products my back of my head where it's thin by my scalp top too is not improving.. I believe you need to sell stronger % instead of 1%
customer_reviews.author: Lucky me

customer_reviews.title: Great product n great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I use the product to revitalize my hair follicles, I gave no problem like allergy with it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Aida Franco

customer_reviews.title: Works for some.. But didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me.. But every product deserves a try.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: Keep your hair
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that my hair doesn't break off easily like it did before I used this product
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Harrell

customer_reviews.title: No headline
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product seems to give posutive results. I'm using it in combination with the Keranique Hair Vitamind
customer_reviews.author: Janyce E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Serum effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for results none noted as yet smells good however
customer_reviews.author: Indayanislag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using for 5 months. I see results. It is working!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Saw one inch of hair growth within two weeks. Will try again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From bald to hair
customer_reviews.text: I actually have a full head of hair. I had a bald spot and now you can't find where it was. I'm female
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't noticed any difference cause it is used with the monoxidil.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Waiting to see
customer_reviews.text: Only been using a week. Hope to see good results.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Auletto

customer_reviews.title: This product has great results.
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than Rogaine. When applied to your scalp, you immediately feel a tingling sensation. I noticed new hair growth within a month.
customer_reviews.author: T Fo

customer_reviews.title: First impression
customer_reviews.text: I just use this overnight complementary with the daily minoxidil 2%
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio G. Sendra Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just began using the product but so far very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: charles petrilla

customer_reviews.title: Please try it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! My hair started to grow in a matter of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Rite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I love the growth that I see happening to my hair
customer_reviews.author: Keon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I am not especially pleased with this product however I have been using it for only three weeks
customer_reviews.author: trisha castellano

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad a product finally lives up to its reputation
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Keranique for just a month. I had bald spots in the front of my hair. I am being totally honest. IT REALLY DOES WORK. The bald spots are GONE. My hair overall is growing extremely well. I am so glad a product finally lives up to its reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: overnight serum works wonders for my thin hair will be reordering soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works! Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, if you apply it e Rey night as directed to the thinning spots it will work, my hair grew back and hair loss stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Leal

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has made my hair thick and grow longer in just 4 weeks of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Keranique Intensive Overnight Hair Serum, 2 Fl Oz – Keratin Amino Complex, Sulfate, Dyes and Parabens Free | Helps Grow Longer, Promote Healthy and Strengthen Thinning Hair
product_meta.description: Size:2 OunceA powerful anti-aging serum packed with cutting edge ingredients including award winning Redensyl® plus patented Copper Peptides that work while you sleep to nourish follicles and scalp while rebalancing the hair growth cycle. Helps to anchor the hair at the root.
feature_bullets: MAINTAINS HEALTHY GROWTH CYCLE: This intensive overnight hair serum nourishes the hair follicle for improved growth condition and helps the hair follicles to maintain a healthy growth cycle

WORKS WHEN YOU SLEEP: Keranique Overnight Hair Repair Serum works while you sleep to help replenish and nourish the hair follicle for improved growth while helps to anchor the hair at the root and rebalances the hair growth and it helps support natural cell renewal to ensure that follicles continue to replenish during your hair’s growth phase, while energizing the scalp

SUPPORTS HEALTHY SCALP: It supplies nutrients necessary for the follicle to rebalance the hair growth cycle and copper peptides that help provide nutrition to the scalp and supports a healthy scalp which helps encourage the growth of healthy hair

PROMOTES THICKER AND FULLER HAIR: It Provides the scalp and follicle with polyphenols, zinc and glycine to encourage revitalization of the hair growth cycle and it is enriched with Keratin Amino Complex to thicken, strengthen and protect thinning hair

NOURISHES THE SCALP: Using new ingredients based on the science behind stem cell and telomere technology, Keranique Overnight Hair Repair Serum helps support natural cell renewal to ensure that follicles continue to replenish during your hair’s growth phase, while it energizes and nourishes the scalp
